package.name: Vgroup_Backupdel
package.summary: Extension automatically deletes backups created by Magento backup tool. It keeps backup for selected days only.
package.description:
The extension automatically delete backups created by Magento backup tool, In the extension, you have the option to select the number of days for which you want to keep the backups, extension will automatically delete all the backups prior to it. Extension features includes: 1. Deletion of backups. 2. Scheduled operation. 3. Exclude selected days.
How to use: 1. Login in your administrator account. 2. Then navigate to System > Configuration. 3. Click on “Delete Backup” link under “General Tab” from left sidebar. 4. Select days to keep backup for these days generated by Magento System. 5. Then click on “Save Config” button. 6. And let the cron do every thing.
Note: Please be sure cron is enabled in your setup.
